properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Baba naleta nafsi yangu
mikononi mwako. x2
Unitakase Baba (ninakuomba)
unigeuze niwe mtu mwema
(ninakuja) mbele yako.
Ee Baba naleta nafsi
yangu mikononi mwako.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sadaka yangu naileta
mkononi mwako,
uwezo wangu waujua
ulivyouuamba, nipokee Baba.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Imeandikwa nikuombe
wewe ndiwe mbaji,
nabisha hodi nifungulie
mimi ni mwombaji
nakuomba Baba.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sifichi kitu siri yangu
waijua Mungu,
nilicho nacho ndicho
hicho unipacho Mungu
nakuomba Baba.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ninakupenda wewe
Mungu na jirani yangu,
kwenye upendo na mapendo
wewe upo Mungu,
Mungu ni upendo.
